𓃭 Letter ‘L’ as Leo:
(𓊪𓏏𓍯𓃭𓐝𓇋𓇋𓋴)| = Petro.Leomeis = Ptolemy(s)

Originally with deep L or ‘Reo’ as roar:

𓂋𓅱𓃭 RW/LW Löwe/lion/labiy’ = אריה aRier!
